titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, regarding appointment of an independent counsel.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12818-12819)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/13/1994--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to require that the appropriate division of the court appoint as an independent counsel an individual who is without an actual or apparent personal, financial, or political conflict of interest.
